main event: Several citizens in Cleburne, Texas observed an unknown object in the sky on 7 November 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 25 to 30 feet in diameter and lighted from the inside., The object was traveling at a high rate of speed at an altitude of approximately 3,000 to 4,000 feet., It was observed for a period of approximately 3 to 5 minutes before it disappeared., Witnesses stated the object appeared larger than a conventional aircraft and made no sound., The sighting was confirmed by the U.S. Air Force, which tracked the object on radar.
